name: GeoQuiz MCP Server
description: VWorld satellite-based map quiz server using Korean geographic data
author: GeoQuiz Team

tools.name: create_map_quiz
tools.description: Create a map-based geography quiz using VWorld satellite imagery. Generates a quiz with specified location and type.

iskorea.description: Whether the location is within Korean peninsula

quiz_type.description: Type of answer (administrative division or natural terrain)

zoom.description: Map zoom level (10-16 for Korea, 7-8 for overseas)

tools.name: request_hint
tools.description: Request hints for a specific quiz by quiz_id. Provides clues without revealing the exact answer.

tools.name: request_answer
tools.description: Get the answer for a specific quiz by quiz_id. Returns complete answer with map link and explanation.

resources.name: Quiz Data Structure
resources.description: Schema for quiz records containing location data, types, and coordinates

resources.name: VWorld Static Image API Reference
resources.description: Complete VWorld API documentation with parameters, basemap types, and example URLs

resources.name: Tool Usage Guide
resources.description: Detailed usage guide for all three GeoQuiz MCP tools with input/output specifications

resources.name: Deployment Configuration
resources.description: Server deployment info, requirements, environment variables, and features
